subSubSection.paragraph:
Munida curvirostris
. —
Baba & Macpherson, 1991: 538

Not
Munida andamanica
. — Tirmizi, 1966: 198 (material from Zanzibar area, 640 m =
M. africana Balss, 1913
; the identity of the other material from the Gulf of Aden in 457–1022 m and Maldives in 456 m remains questionable; see Macpherson & de Saint Laurent, 2002: 467 ).
